item.title: CodeMirror Spell Checker Extended
item.description: Updated codemirror-spell-checker with new build process and multiple language support. Update build process using webpack Ignores numbers If you have .aff and .dic files you can host them and load them for multilanguage functionality.

item.title: Simplemde Markdown Editor Extended
item.description: Updated simplemde with new build process and dependency update for better spellchecking. Update build process using webpack Update Spellchecking facilities
